TopicTitle: Need some help with modpack => game always crash

Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

I have not play since ksp 1.0 i want to play to ksp back but my game now always crash with mods .... i have try to download modpack from KerbalX website and anyway modpack that people currently use still make my game crash, so i need to ask why ??? Why they can play with this modpack but my game is crashing ? i have a good CPU and GC so i don't really understand where is the problem.

If someone may have an idea for this.... 

 

thanks

Edited November 19, 2017 by nandhii

6 hours ago, nandhii said:

I have not play since ksp 1.0 i want to play to ksp back but my game now always crash with mods .... i have try to download modpack from KerbalX website and anyway modpack that people currently use still make my game crash, so i need to ask why ??? You should have a crash log what version KSP you running and what version is the mod pack wanting ? 

EDIT- You still using KSP 1.0 ?

Edited November 20, 2017 by Mecripp

no 1.3.1 anyway i solve my problem with this :  -force-opengl or -force-d3d11 , it's working fine now 

Edited November 20, 2017 by nandhii
